title: Easy DnD Rolls
description: An easy to use DnD dice roller online application built with vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Members of my dnd group like to use it when their dice set isn’t available so that’s pretty cool.

title: Where's The Pizza?
description: Directory website with listings to find the best pizza restaurants in the United States. I used this project to learn how to work with a large amount of data in a static website.

title: Great Seal Studios
description: A new indie game studio that I’m currently working with as a web engineer and technical developer. I designed and built the website and constantly update it.
